PrizesInfo.title: Nice Try!

Keep trying to play again and get
 another chance to win cool prizes!

PrizesInfo.title: Congratulations!

PrizesInfo.title: Congratulations!
PrizesInfo.description: You have won the grand prize! Congrats on your Iphone 17 Promax!
